review_title: Non-profit agency with excellent team, values, and goals
pros: Successful management team, driven to utilize dollars to help seniors and people with disabilities. Great area of service, expending ongoing. Opportunity to grow, to be heard, to be respected and supported. Unionized environment.
cons: Getting more funding to employ more staff and serve more clients.

job_title: Social Worker/Case Manager in Toronto, ON
pros:
Flexibility 
Good benefits 
Comfortable
Quiet
Nice staff
cons:
Not supportive 
No understanding of the role

job_title: Social Media Manager in Toronto, ON
pros: Since starting at CANES, I have learned so much about senior care and just how amazing seniors are. I enjoy working for CANES because everyone I worked with over the years is always friendly, ready to help when needed and open to new ideas. I’m proud to work at CANES Community Care because they care about the clients they serve and keep looking for ways to expand the care they provide to seniors.
cons: There just aren't enough non profit agencies like CANES Community Care out there helping seniors in communities across Ontario.

pros: Multicultural, respectful and professional environment. Great work/life balance.
cons: No cons. I'm very happy working at CANES
